project.name: SparkIT — ICT Literacy Initiative
project.tagline: Igniting ICT literacy across Sri Lanka, one district at a time.
project.about: SparkIT explores Sri Lanka's digital economy through hands-on learning and maker energy. Start in SparkIT Flash to register and pitch your idea; build and learn; showcase in SparkIT Fusion.

phases.title: SparkIT Flash — Bridging the Gap
phases.summary: For schools already exposed to ICT, SparkIT strengthens their foundation with advanced programming, robotics, and cybersecurity.

phases.title: SparkIT Fusion
phases.summary: Advanced fusion of technology and innovation - Coming Soon! This phase will feature cutting-edge workshops and collaborative projects.

faq.question: Who can join this?
faq.answer: This project is open to students enthusiastic about ICT and eager to enhance their digital skills.

faq.question: Is SparkIt Flash held online or physical?
Is there a cost to join the program?
Do I need any prior computer knowledge to join?
faq.answer: No The sessions suit all levels—from beginners to advanced learners
